title: Group portrait of groom wearing moustache and light colored bow tie, standing with smiling bride wearing mid length veil, earrings, necklace, light colored short sleeve wedding dress with floral lace sleeves, and light colored elbow length fingerless gloves, gathered behind table with light colored tablecloth and five tiered wedding cake in interior with floral wallpaper, windows with blinds and light colored curtains, possibly on Webster Avenue in the Hill District
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
